constraints.name: operation_rule
constraints.description: 每次操作时，选择一个数x划掉，并任选一个正整数a，在划掉之后需要再写上x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a共K个数，且a需满足x-K*a >= 0。若这样的a不存在，则不能划掉这个数。
constraints.formal: For each operation, choose an integer x and a positive integer a such that x - K * a >= 0. Then, replace x with the sequence x-a, x-2a, ..., x-K*a. If no such a exists, the number cannot be removed.

constraints.name: game_end_condition
constraints.description: 当某个人无法进行有效操作时（即找不到满足条件的a），则该人失败，另一方获胜。
constraints.formal: The game ends when a player cannot make a valid move (i.e., no a satisfies the condition). The player who cannot move loses, and the other player wins.
